text: <speak>From your spending limit of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, you currently do not have a balance owing on your account.</speak>
De votre limite de crédit de $session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $, vous n'avez actuellement aucun solde dû au compte.
You currently do not have a balance owing on your account.
Vous n'avez actuellement aucun solde dû sur votre compte.
<speak>This amount includes <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt of unbilled charges.</speak>
<speak>Ce solde inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>
<speak>From your spending limit of <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, you currently have a credit balance of $$session.params.clp_total_balance on your account.
This credit will be applied on your next bill once it comes out.</speak>

<speak>De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, vous avez un solde en crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody> sur votre compte.
Ce crédit sera appliqué sur votre prochaine facture une fois sortie.</speak>
<speak>You currently have a credit balance of <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.total_due</prosody> on your account.
This credit will be applied on your next bill once it comes out.</speak>
<speak>Vous avez actuellement un solde en crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.total_due $</prosody> sur votre compte.
Ce crédit sera appliqué sur votre prochaine facture une fois sortie.</speak>
<speak>This amount includes <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>
<speak>Ce solde inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>

<speak>From your spending limit of <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody>. The full amount is overdue as it was due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, votre solde actuel au compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody>. Le montant total est en retard car il était dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>Your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.past_due_amt</prosody>. The full amount is overdue as it was due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>Votre solde total actuel sur le compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.past_due_amt $</prosody>. Le montant total est en retard et était due le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>
<speak>This amount includes, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>
<speak>Ce solde inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>

<speak>From your spending limit of, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt</prosody>, your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clp_total_balance</prosody>, which is due for <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, votre solde actuel au compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody>, et il est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>Your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.total_due</prosody> which is due for <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as>.</speak>

<speak>This amount includes, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges.</speak>

<speak>De votre limite de crédit de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.creditLimitAmt $</prosody>, votre solde actuel au compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clp_total_balance $</prosody>.</speak>
<speak>Your current total balance on the account is, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.total_due</prosody>.

From that balance, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.current_due_amt</prosody> is due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as> and, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.past_due_amt</prosody> is overdue.</speak>
<speak>Votre solde total actuel sur le compte est de, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.total_due $</prosody>.

De ce montant, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.total_due $</prosody> est dû le <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as> et, <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.past_due_amt $</prosody> est en retard.</speak>

<speak>From that balance, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.current_due_amt</prosody> is due on <say-as interpret-as="date" format="md">$session.params.payment_due_date</say-as> and, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.past_due_amt</prosody> is overdue. This also includes, <prosody rate=".80">$$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt</prosody> of unbilled charges</speak>

Ça inclut aussi <prosody rate=".80">$session.params.clmSummary.unpaidUnbilledAmt $</prosody> de frais non facturé.</speak>
